text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro! Welcome to another Nerdy
Nummies!

Today, I got so many requests to do something
Angry Birds, so I am gonna be making
Angry Birds Pizzas!

The ingredients that you’ll need, will be:
Cheeses, we have mozzarella and the cheddar,

chopped pineapple, white mushrooms, chopped
up olives, pepperoni, orange peppers
and ranch!
Let’s get started!
A-bah-bah-bah-bah-bah-bah-bah!

So I’ve pre-bought 3 pizzas, they weren’t
the frozen ones, they’re the refrigerated
ones, so they’re ready to decorate basically,
and we’re gonna start with yellow bird!

We’re gonna start with olives on our pineapple
pizza, and, we’re gonna take up the

chopped olives, and we’re gonna outline
the shape of our bird, so we kind of will

have an idea of how big he’s gonna be. What
you’ll want to do is just make a big

triangle outline with the olives. It doesn’t
have to be too thick, just as long as
you can see that black line.
To give this silly little Angry Bird a shape.

Now we’ve got our olives all over, to outline
our yellow bird, and we’re going to

take the little pineapple, the little pineapple
slices and basically just fill it in,
and leave a little room for the eyes.

So now we got all the little pineapples all
over, and for the little eyeballs, you

just take the end of an olive and cut it off,
and then we stuck it right there,

boom-boom! The shredded cheddar cheese was
a little bit too thin, so I’m just taking

a slice of cheese, and I’m going to cut
it to be the same size
that I want for his beak!

Ta-da, we got his little beak all done, and
now we’re gonna use the orange peppers
to make his angry eyebrows!

Da-da! We just got our yellow bird all done
and now we’re gonna make
the red bird, so get out the pepperoni!

After you’ve made an outline with olives
for the red bird, on your pizza, take your
pepperonis and just fill it in!
Leave room for the eyes and the beak.

Ta-da! We’re all done with the red bird,
and now we have the last pizza, which is

going to be the bomb bird pizza. And it’s
gonna be all veggies, with rayo…

And you put it in this little plastic bag,
just like I did on the Game of Thrones
pizza with the barbecue sauce.

I’m using light, I don’t know if that
matters, probably not!

Then we’re just gonna take some baking scissors
and snip the tip, and then we’re
gonna make an outline. And this is gonna be our veggie pizza because we’re gonna be using
peppers and olives…

Then you’re just gonna take a bunch of olives,
and put them all over.
Ooop, dig-uh-dig-uh!

Now we’re gonna make his eyes, and what
you’re gonna use are the white mushrooms.

Got my little mushroom right here, what you’re
gonna do is just cut off the top.
So that they’ll be kind of 3-D.

So take your mushroom tops, put ‘em here,
and take your olive tops, put ‘em on top,

and then take your orange peppers, for the
eyebrows to look like this.

Perfect! And then we’re just gonna chop
up a lot of these, a lot of mushrooms,
and fill in the bottom.

Ta-da! Our Angry Bird Pizzas are all done,
I just finished making the black bird,

we have 3 different kinds of pizzas, we have
your veggie pizza, we have your fruit

pizza and we have your meat pizza, so, now
you are going to preheat the oven to 375

and then take the pizzas off these cardboards,
just stick them right on the rack
and bake them for about 14 minutes. Yay!

Thanks you guys for suggesting it! I had so
much fun making it!

If you have any other ideas for any other
Nerdy Nummies, please let me know,

leave me a comment down below and I will do
my best to make them happen.

Also a reminder, Nerdy Nummies comes out every
Tuesday, I get a lot of questions

about that, and you can subscribe somewhere
around here, uh, so it will give you a
reminder, every Tuesday!
OK, thanks you guys, bye-bye!
Meep!
